newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Degussa in Singapore distribution venture.
newsitem.headline: Degussa in Singapore distribution venture.

text.p: German-based Degussa AG signed an agreement with Jebsen & Jessen (SEA) Pte Ltd on Thursday to form a joint venture to market and distribute industrial chemicals and precious metals in Asia.
The 50-50 Singapore-based venture will be set up on April 1, said a statement by the new company, JJ-Degussa Pte Ltd.
The statement did not give the capitalisation of the venture.

Jebsen & Jessen has been distributing Degussa products in Singapore and Malaysia for more than 20 years and the new firm will spread the distribution network to other southeast Asian countries, the statement said.
Degussa's main business includes precious metal and pharmaceutical manufactuering. It operates one of the world's largest precious metal refineries.
Jebesen & Jessen, with more than 40 subsidiaries in Asia, is in the chemicals, communications, industrial products, marketing, material handling, packaging and processing technology businesses.
